Entry.329: 401 Feel good. Slept most of morning. A/noon. Concert by Lena Ashwell’s Concert party. Very good. Up after tea.
Entry.330: 7/12/17. 402. Not too well. Got blues. Off color generally. Slept past mail time. A/noon. Slept. Got up after tea.
Entry.331: 403. Much better. Dr Stanley marked me for England. Rather elated at idea of going there. No 4. (Reid) also marked. Got up after tea & sat by fire. Got cake f. Mr. B. Had it for supper.
Entry.332:
404. Feel tip top. Expect to go today. Packed up etc. After tea got up & word came to leave at 8.30. Got ready

Sun 9/12/17 404 & left hospital 9. Got on train & arr. Le Havre 9 pm next night.
Entry.333:
405 All day in train. Sick of it. Arr. Havre 9 pm & got on S/S "Panama" bound for Southampton. Left 12 m. n.

Tues.11/12/17. 406. Arr. England 
 10 
 early morn. Got off steamer 3 pm. & then on train for Birmingham where I went into the Ward A4
Entry.334: Southern General Hospital, being very glad to get into bed after a very tedious journey. Slept well after some supper.

Entry.336: 408. Feel better. After dressing side much better. Taken to Xray room but felt too weak to stand long wait they imposed on me so came back & have to go again. Slept from dinner to tea the sleep of the just. After tea sat up & wrote letters.
Entry.337:

Entry.338: 410. Feel better today than I have since I came over. In fact I feel great. Had short & larger tube put into side. Wrote letters in morning & after tea. Had some mail which cheered me up a lot.
Entry.339:
411. Feel good. Terrible day. Wind rain & snow Job to keep warm in bed even. A/noon. Visitors came but none to me. Felt a little out of it. People I expected barred by weather. £ 2 not to hand yet.

Mon. 17/12/17. 412. Feel good. Did not sleep too well. Got parcel from Norah of Candied figs. Nice day. Great change on yesterday. Lot of snow lying. Got nasty headache after tea. Unable to write Mrs. Linley Had lovely box of fruit f Mrs. Linley

Entry.341: 413. Feel much better this morning. Quite happy at getting 10/- from Mrs. Shellshear (on Mrs L’s suggestion) having been stony since coming here. Had inspection of whole ward by C.O. Had fruit given out by sister from kiddies of Camden St. Infants School.
Entry.342:
414. Feel good. 2 big parcels came & made me very happy. One from dear little Flossie & the other f. London of lovely sweets. Flo’s parcel was a Xmas one & was really lovely. Such a delicious lot of things in it. Long to be home with her & all the boys & girls. Visiting day. None for me. Had £ 1 from John for Xmas f Mrs Shellshear. Wrote after tea to Mrs. L.

Entry.343:
415. Feel good. Side not sore this morning but have a slight cold. Slept all a/noon. Too cold to write.

Fri 21/12/17. 416. Feel OK. Side a little sore. Had washout. Got X Ray Report showing 2 pieces of shell in my skull. Got big Muffler & Larsen’s too f Mrs. Linley. Glad of it. Sent Larsen’s on to him today.

Sat 22/12/17. 417. Felt a bit off on a/c of cold. Slept most of day.

Sun. 23/12/17. 418 Still off. Sore in joints. Visiting day. None for me. Slept most of day.

Mon. 24/12/17. 419. Still off Xmas Eve. Plenty of cheer from B/ham folk. Got Xmas

Mon 24/12/17. 419. Box f Aus. R. Cross. Also Scarf Writing pad, chocolate & cigarettes f Nursing staff of Ward AA. Carols sung by School Children in evening.

Tues. 25/12/17. 420. Xmas Day. Feel much better as the result of Aspirin nurse gave me thro’ the night. Feel bright. Plenty of cheer & promises of happy day. Ham & pork pie for b/fast. Dinner - Mayor of City read message f King George V. One of the Drs here dressed as a Chef officiated with the Carvers & was very amusing & nice. Had lovely turkey (& Sausage) & Xmas Dough & plenty of fruit & nuts. A really lovely dinner & I thoroughly enjoyed it. Music in a/noon & Concert after tea by boys of ward. Felt off thro’ Xmas pudding so

Thur. 27/12/17/ 422. Feel good this morning. Slept most of day. Whist Drive after tea. Did not play at all.

Fri. 28/12/17. 423. Don’t feel too well. Sick in stomach & side sore. Felt off all day & slept most of time. After the sister gave me dose for sickness which minimised the trouble considerably. Had cable f Dick which made me feel a good deal happier.

Entry.379: 465. Not too good. Did not go out to b/fast. Had it in ward. Still have D/rea badly. Day very wet & dull. Dr. saw me & marked me for board. Turned in early.

466. Did not get up till 1.30 under Drs orders. Went on Board & was marked C3. Mr & Mrs. Linley came to see me. Very happy at them coming. Brought me all sorts of lovely things. Sorry to have them go. Feel well today.

Entry.385: 471 Rose 7. Spent morning by fire reading Wrote all a/noon by fire. Told I was to have 7 day’s furlough. Leaving for London Monday. Could not get more as Drs. want me to get home as soon as possible. Feel fairly well.
Entry.386: 15/2/`8 472. Feel great. Spent morning by fire & getting ready for furlough. Went to village in a/noon for Mrs. Linley. Wrote rest of a/noon.
Entry.387: 473. Feel great. Had O.G.B to see me. Also Mr. Shellshear in a/noon. Went out to village P.O. & rang Mrs. Linley up.
Entry.388:
474 Feel good. Very cold morning. Had Mr. Linley over on his bike in a/noon. Packed up ready to leave in morng.

Letter f Jack 13/2/18.
Entry.389:
475 Rose 6.30. Went to Q.M Store for kit at 7.15 Got ready to leave, 8.30. Went to A/misn Hall ready to start. 9. Left by Motor for Denham. Caught train for Marylebone where I met Mr. B. Formed up & marched to tube which we took to St. James’ Park & H.Q. Had some tea & cakes, got pass pay &c. Mr. B. met me at H.Q & helped me thro’. Drew pound; 18 pay. Got 14 days leave instead of 7. Had lunch at Lyons’ with Mr. B & then went & sat in Lounge of Grosvenor Hotel & yarned for about an hour. 2. Left by motor bus from Victoria to Cricklewood. Met Mrs. L at C- & after saying Au revoir to Mr. B at station left for home. Arr. home about 4. Felt very tired & fatigued. Played pianola till Dinner at 6.30. Turned in 10.15 while Air Raid was in progress. Had good night’s sleep.

Entry.393: 481 Slept fairly well. Rose 9.30. Went up town to shop for Mrs. L & got back knocked up. Wrote for an hour & then went out to meet Mr. B & Ruth Shellshear who are coming to a/noon tea. Nellie S. also came.
Entry.394: 482 Rose 9.30. Did some work for Mr. Linley. After dinner went into Gladstone Park with Mrs. L for walk.
Entry.395:

Entry.396: 484 Went to Dentist 9.30 & had tooth done. Retd home 11 am. Lunch. Wrote letters & then up town with Mrs. L. Got back 4.30 dead beat. Rang up Mr. Brooke .Felt very off after dinner & turned in early & slept well.
Entry.397:
485. Rose 8.30. Packed bag to forward to Weymouth. 11. Set out for Grosvenor & met Mr. B. Not feeling too good. Had lunch & felt better. Went to Sir J. Bennett’s shop in Cheapside & Mr B bought me a lovely signet ring from he & his sister. Got pen fixed & then had some tea & set out for home arriving thence 4.45 pm pretty tired. 

Wrote John.

Wrote John note & sent him £ 1 note.

Letter f Mrs. Shellshear.

Wrote " " & sent fancywork.

" Mrs. M. Brooke

" Miss. L. Brooke.
Entry.398: 486. Feel much better today. Weather too bad to go to Shellshears. Spent a/noon writing to John.
Entry.401:
487. Left 10.30 for London by bus. Got watch fixed & then got Onoto pen for Met & gave him pen. Very pleased with it. Went to lunch & retd to office to say Good-bye. Sent £ 1 to John. Met Mr. Brooke at Grosvenor at 2.30. Stayed there & had tea & left at 4 for Baker St where I caught train for home arriving thence 5.15. After dinner Mrs. Forsyth & Kathleen & Mr. Linley’s sister came over to see me. Got to bed 11.15.

Sat 
30
Entry.402:
488. Very cold day. Too bad to go out to Shellshears. Stayed in by the fire all a/noon.

Wrote Mrs. Linley

Wrote Mrs. Linley

"	O.G.B

"	

"	Herb Larsen

Mon
Entry.403: 489. Stayed home all day with Linleys. Fixed up Agreement in evening.
Entry.404: 490 Rose 7. Left Linley’s 9.15. Took train to Nelson Mt & then taxi to H.Q. said Good-bye to Linley’s. Mrs. L. cut up. Met Mr. B & went on parade. Left at 11 for Waterloo. 12.30 said Good-bye to Mr B & left for Weymouth. 4.30 Reached W- & went to West Ham Camp. Stayed there all night.
Entry.405:
491 Rose 7. Parade 8.15. Inspected by Drs. 1. Left by motor for Littlemoor Camp. Got there 2 & settled down at last to the new conditions of a military camp after hospital. 

Wrote Mrs. L.

Wrote Jack

" Mrs. L.

Letter f Mrs. L.

"	O.G.B.

"	

"	Capt Savage

"	Don Beaton

Wrote Mrs. L.
Entry.406: 492. Nice clear day. Put before Drs & marked "No duty for camp." Spent day about Camp. Had shave in a/noon. Left at 4 for W/mouth. Went to theatre & then got bag from Station & caught car from there to camp again.
Entry.407: 493. Cold & dull day. Feel good. Spent morning in seeing chums & writing. Met George Broad from 15th F. Coy A’E. Went for walk into Littlemoor after tea. Jack came to me about 9 after I went on leave & slept in hut.
Entry.408:
494 Spent morning with Jack. After dinner was boarded by Col. Newmarsh of N.S & marked. C3. John had tea with me & then we went to where John had got a lodging.

Letter f Mrs. L.

Wrote Mrs. L.

Wrote O.G.B

"
Entry.409: 495 Spent morning with John in camp. After dinner John & Geo Broad & I caught a bus to Weymouth. Went to pictures. Had tea. Then met two other hut mates & we all went to see "Within the law" at the Pavilion on the pier. Caught the motor home & thus ended a most happy day. Gave John an Ingersoll watch for present.
Entry.410:
496. Went church in morning. Saw John after church. Had dinner & then went & spent a/noon at his lodging. Had tea there with the old people & at 7.30 came back to camp & turned in.

Mon-
Entry.411:
497. Met John at 9.30. Got pay book back. Spent morning in church Army Hut with John writing letters. Spent a/noon in hut with John. John sewed my colors on & helped me pack my bags. 4 pm Scotty Higgleton, John & I went into Weymouth for the evening. Had tea- eggs & sausage- then did some shopping. We then had

Mon 11/3/18 497. another lot of eggs & toast. After that we went to the Jubilee Hall & saw a show. Caught car & arr. back at camp at 8.30. Had supper at C.A. Hut. John made my bed & then went to his lodging. Coming again in the morning to say Good-bye.
Entry.412: 498 Rose 7. John came in to say Good-bye. Went down road with him. Did not like him going a bit. He left at 7.45. Spent morning writing. Spent a/noon on fatigue carrying paliases from huts to straw store. After tea went to Jack’s lodging & had cup of tea. Came back & had supper at C.A & then to hut & wrote John & sent home mail on to him. Turned in 9 pm.
Entry.413:
499. Rose 7. Had b/fast. Spent morning playing cards & writing letters in Y.M.C.A. Had bath in a/noon.

Wrote John

Wed. 13/3/18 499. After tea went for walk w Scotty to see old lady & took washing along. Came home & had supper & turned in.
Entry.414: 500 Rose 7.30. After b/fast went to O/Room & found I was C3 & no duties. Spent morning in Y.M.C.A writing letters. Spent a/noon in hut writing home. Left camp at 4 & got car into Weymouth. Had tea with Scotty & then went to see "Chorus Lady" at Pavilion. Very poor show. Got back to camp at 8.30. Had supper & turned in.
Entry.415:
501. Rose 7. Pde 9. Volunteered for in O/R. Put day in at it. Proved too much. After tea saw C.S.M & got off the job as I am not fit for it. Stayed in camp all evening. Had supper & turned in at 9.

Wrote Flo last letter.

Entry.416: 502. Rose 7. Spent morning in hut writing. After dinner went with Scotty into Upwey & out on hills overlooking camp. Enjoyed it. Got back to camp 5. Had cup of tea. Turned in early & slept well. Lovely day.
Entry.417: 503. Rose 7. Dull & wet day. Spent morning in Y.M.C.A with Scotty writing. Put on fire piquet. Did not leave camp all day. Did not want to. Turned in early.
Entry.418:
504. Glorious Spring day. Quite warm. Spent morning writing in hut. 4 pm. Went Weymouth w Scotty. Met old Scotty Russell. Had tea at usual place. Went to see "Diplomacy" at Palladium. Best show yet seen by me. Arr back camp 9. Turned in & slept well.

Wrote Mrs. L

"	O.G.B.

Entry.419: 505 Day dull & wet but warm. Spent morning in Y.M.C.A writing letters. Put a/noon in Hut playing Bobs w Scottie. Turned in early & slept well.
Entry.420: 506 Rose 7. Not too good. heart crook. Lovely day Spent morning writing in hut. After tea went to see Mrs. Ayles & got washing. Came back & had supper & turned in. Had good night.
Entry.421:
507.

Rose 7.30. Heart much better. Spent morning in Y.M.C.A. writing. Very dull & foggy up to 11. After tea went to Weymouth & Jubilee Hall. Got back 8.30. Supper & bed.
Entry.422:
508. Rose 6.30. Feel good. Spent morning writing & card playing. Had bath in a/noon. After tea went w washing to Mrs. Ayles. Turned in early & slept well.

Wrote Mrs. L.
